mapper.select: SELECT GUID, MASTERGUID, PARENTGUID, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, DATASEQ, ITEMNAME, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, CODE, ISCLASSIFICATION FROM MA_CODE_DETAIL
SELECT GUID, MASTERGUID, PARENTGUID, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, DATASEQ, ITEMNAME, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, CODE, ISCLASSIFICATION FROM MA_CODE_DETAIL WHERE GUID = #GUID#

SELECT GUID, MASTERGUID, PARENTGUID, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, DATASEQ, ITEMNAME, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, CODE, ISCLASSIFICATION FROM MA_CODE_DETAIL
and GUID=#GUID# and MASTERGUID=#MASTERGUID# and PARENTGUID=#PARENTGUID# and ITEMNAME=#ITEMNAME# and TITLE=#TITLE# and DESCRIPTION=#DESCRIPTION# and CODE=#CODE#
mapper.update:
UPDATE MA_CODE_DETAIL
UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, DATASEQ=#DATASEQ#, TITLE=#TITLE#, DESCRIPTION=#DESCRIPTION#, CODE=#CODE#,
WHERE GUID = #GUID#
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MA_CODE_DETAIL(GUID, MASTERGUID, PARENTGUID, DATASEQ, ITEMNAME, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, CODE, ISCLASSIFICATION, CREATETIME, CREATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID ) VALUES(#GUID:VARCHAR#, #MASTERGUID:VARCHAR#, #PARENTGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DATASEQ:NUMERIC#, #ITEMNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TITLE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #DESCRIPTION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CODE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISCLASSIFICATION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL# )
